arts.ttl: Laimer on the battle for playing time at Bayern: "It's like a shark tank"
arts.sum: Konrad Laimer has spoken of his battle for game time at Bayern Munich, describing his environment as a "shark tank".

arts.ttl: Report: Sabitzer given telling off by Dortmund bosses
arts.sum: Following his public criticism of Nuri Sahin, Marcel Sabitzer was reportedly given a dressing down by the Borussia Dortmund bosses.
